text: Charles Robberts Swart DMS (5 December 1894 â€“ 16 July 1982), nicknamed Blackie, was a South African politician who served as the last Governor- General of the Union of South Africa from 1959 to 1961 and the first State President of the Republic of South Africa from 1961 to 1967. title: Charles Robberts Swart
